snippet.title: Sunken Stones  - Short Trailer
snippet.description:
Sunken Stones is a turn based Puzzle-Strategy game about pirates and cursed treasure. Choose a captain, gather your crew and defeat monsters by strategically placing units on a 5x5 grid.

Embark on a thrilling adventure as a fearless pirate captain in this captivating strategy role playing game based on "Into the Breach" and "Go". 

Navigate the treacherous seas, assemble a formidable crew and set sail to collect precious treasures in the name of the empire. But beware, for the ocean is envious of those who hoard her riches, and the terrifying denizens of the deep will stop at nothing to claim what's rightfully theirs. 

Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2601810/Sunken_Stones/

Thumbnail Artwork by:
https://x.com/SunsetBoy18
